items.label: Start dev server
items.description: Opens the app in your browser so you can see your changes live

items.label: Build for production
items.description: Creates the final version of the app for users

items.label: Install all packages
items.description: Downloads all packages your project needs

items.label: Update packages
items.description: Updates packages to newer versions

items.label: Go to folder
items.description: Moves you into another folder so you can work there.

items.label: Show folder tree
items.description: Draws a folder map so you can see structure.

items.label: Run tests
items.description: Checks if your code works correctly (watches for changes)

items.label: Run CI tests
items.description: Runs all tests once and shows a coverage report

items.label: Run E2E tests
items.description: Tests the app like a real user clicking through it

items.label: Lint + TypeScript Check
items.description:
Checks for lint and typescript errors.
Lint = "Is the code clean?"
Type = "Do the types fit together?"

items.label: Run linter
items.description: Finds code style issues and common mistakes

items.label: Type check
items.description: Catches bugs by checking your code makes sense

items.label: Full CI verify
items.description: Runs everything to make sure the code is ready to ship

items.label: Check for security issues
items.description: Scans packages for known security problems

items.label: See updates
items.description: Shows which tools have newer versions available.

items.label: Start Claude Code
items.description: Opens the Claude AI coding assistant in your terminal

items.label: Start Codex
items.description: Opens the OpenAI Codex assistant in your terminal

items.label: Edit MCP config
items.description: Opens the MCP server settings file to add new tools

items.label: Check what changed
items.description: Shows which files you've modified since your last save

items.label: Upload to GitHub
items.description: Sends your saved changes to GitHub

items.label: Download latest
items.description: Gets the newest code from GitHub

items.label: Check what changed
items.description: Shows files you've modified

items.label: Switch to main branch
items.description: Goes back to the main branch

items.label: Check what changed
items.description: Shows files you've modified

items.label: Select all changes
items.description: Marks everything you changed, including deletions, for the next save.

items.label: View changes
items.description: Shows exactly what changed in your files.

items.label: Create new branch
items.description: Creates a new branch (new version) and moves you into it.

items.label: Switch branch
items.description: Moves you to another branch (another version) so you can work there.

items.label: Pull from main branch
items.description: Use this to sync remote git repo into local before starting work (syncs remote → local)

items.label: Lint + Type + Test
items.cmd: pnpm lint && pnpm typecheck && pnpm test:ci
items.description: Runs all quality checks in sequence (stops if one fails)

items.label: Clean + Install
items.description: Wipes packages and reinstalls everything fresh

items.label: Clean all caches
items.confirm: This will delete Next.js cache and node_modules cache. Continue?
items.description: Fixes weird bugs by clearing temporary files

items.label: Hard reset to HEAD
items.confirm: This will discard ALL uncommitted changes! Are you sure?
items.description: Throws away all your unsaved changes (can't undo!)

items.label: Test if code runs correctly
items.description:
Runs automated tests to verify behavior.

"Does it do what it's supposed to?"

items.label: Show all aliases
items.description: Lists all your current shortcuts.

items.label: Remove an alias
items.description: Deletes a shortcut you created.

items.label: Show folder path
items.description: Shows the full path of your current folder.

items.label: List files
items.description: Shows files and folders in this place.

items.label: Clear screen
items.description: Clears the terminal so it’s easier to read.

items.label: Add New Tests
items.cmd: Expand test coverage. Look at existing test files and identify  functions or systems that are tested lightly or not at all.  Implement tests for the most critical gap — prioritize code  that's core to the main functionality of this project.  Follow existing test patterns and conventions in the codebase.  Keep tests focused and avoid testing trivial logic.
items.description:
Expand test coverage. Look at existing test files and identify 
functions or systems that are tested lightly or not at all. 
Implement tests for the most critical gap — prioritize code 
that's core to the main functionality of this project.

Follow existing test patterns and conventions in the codebase. 
Keep tests focused and avoid testing trivial logic.
